author: wn.com
title: Post & Telecommunication Industry (2013): Income from internet services rises by 8,6% (Stats SA - ...
text: ( Source : Stats SA - Statistics South Africa ) 05 October 2015 Media Release Income The total income for the post and telecommunications industry in 2013 was R276,3 billion. The largest contributor to the total income was 'telecommunications'
